Package com.turn.shapeshifter

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FormatTransformer
    Extends Transformer to allow for the specification of a custom format string for the transformed property in the resulting JSON Schema.
    Parser
    This interface encapsulates the task of parsing a JSON node into a protocol buffer Message.
    ReadableSchemaRegistry
    Defines the read operations on a registry of schema instances.
    Schema
    A self-descriptive, two-way transform between a JSON object and a Protocol Buffer message.
    SchemaSource
    A source for instances of Schema that are built from a Protocol Buffer Descriptors.Descriptor.
    Serializer
    Encapsulates the task of serializing a Message to JSON.
    ShapeshifterProtos.JsonSchemaOrBuilder  
    Transformer
    A two-way transform between an external node and an internal value.
    WritableSchemaRegistry
    Extends ReadableSchemaRegistry to add write operations for named schemas.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutoSchema
    AutoSchema instances are schemas of the simplest kind.
    JsonSchemas
    Utility class for JSON schemas manipulation.
    NamedSchema
    A configurable, immutable schema with a name.
    NamedSchemaParser
    Implementation of Parser based on the configuration contained in a NamedSchema.
    SchemaRegistry
    A container of schemas.
    ShapeshifterProtos  
    ShapeshifterProtos.JsonSchema  
    ShapeshifterProtos.JsonSchema.Builder  
    Transformers
    Static utilities pertaining to Transformer instances.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ShapeshifterProtos.JsonType  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    JsonSchemaException
    Exception thrown when a Schema cannot be represented as a JSON Schema.
    ParsingException
    Thrown when an error occurs upon parsing JSON content.
    SchemaObtentionException
    Thrown when a Schema cannot be obtained from a SchemaSource.
    SerializationException
    Thrown when an error is encountered upon serializing an Protocol Buffer into JSON.
    UnmappableValueException
    Thrown when a JSON value node cannot be correctly mapped to a Java object.
